title: India's history: British Colony to independence
brief_description: The centuries during which India’s people strove for independence, the role of the British East India Company, the realisation of independence, and the creation of Pakistan and the Union of India are examined. The film also presents the influence of Mohandas Gandhi, the changing relations between India and Britain, and the problems confronting India’s two great people - Hindus and Muslims.
